name: desktopbrowser
description: Web based file explorer, runs locally on your browser, designed for media desktops.

scripts.postinstall: rem npm install client/ --prefix client/ --no-bin-links && npm install server/ --prefix server/ --no-bin-links
scripts.compile: tsc -p client && tsc -p server && sass client/scss/main.scss:client/css/main.css --unix-newlines --sourcemap=none

author: Dan-el Khen
